speaker: agent
text: For [ORGANIZATION], please press [PHONE_NUMBER] for all other inquiries.

speaker: agent
text: Please hold for the next available [OCCUPATION].

speaker: customer
text: Yes, I'm trying to get a glass put in my vehicle.

speaker: customer
text: I just need to get a little information to get to the quotes screen.

speaker: agent
text: What's the first and last name?

speaker: customer
text: What kind of vehicle is it?

speaker: customer
text: And which glass do you need?

speaker: customer
text: The very back glass above the trunk?

speaker: customer
text: Unfortunately, none of my [OCCUPATION] have thisass and didn't give me a price or eta on it.

speaker: agent
text: All right, have a good day, Mr. [PERSON_NAME].
